column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I made a reservation on OpenTable for 6 people on a Tuesday night. This is the first time one of those needed a credit card
column2: which I provided. Fine. A couple of hours beforehand
column3: we needed to add one more person - this was a business dinner. I called and
column5: they said no. I understand this is inconvenient for them
column6: but in thousands of trips to restaurants worldwide
column7: I have never had one deny such a request.
